column5: ...My son Tyler and I went out last night for an hour or so..  We brought along the "PenFishingRod"  to give it a try for some Largemouth and shot a short video for fun. I'm using my "French Canadian redneck " accent.    took a pic as well.     Tyler caught about  8 Largemouth of about the same size and a few sunfish. He also missed "THE POND MONSTER"..  there a few LM's over 8lbs in that PRIVATE pond and my son had it on  It broke the "PenFishingRod" in half .....Got that on video too     RFS
Nice pond, nice bass, really nice hat.

The OFC T-Shirts were out on the line....  Sure is a nice pond.. the whole property is for sale 245.000.00...  22 acres .. private pond ..river water front small 3 bedroom house , barn style 2 door garage with loft .. and 4 serviced lots that are already severed. And a good bass fishery.  If someone buys it .. I'm afraid to lose my permission slip to C&R the pond... I just hope that the current owner puts in a good word for me.  RFS
Sound like you and Tyler had a blast out at the pond!!! Too bad about the biggun that broke the PenFishingRod Thanks for sharing Leechman

Kids always have things in the right perspective.... your son was laughing his butt off about YOUR reaction to the busted rod....  He didn't seem to care about the "pond monster"... lol  I love fishing with my daughter
